item.title: First blog entry
item.description: I came across Hugo in a fortunate way in April this year. It was thanks to the course I took with Innovaccion Virtual that I got to hear about Hugo. The instructor, Carlo Gilmar, showed us how to create a small static website for blogging and publishing how our learning path has been in the course.
